experiences.title: Machine Learning Researcher
experiences.subtitle: Cosyne Therapeutics
workDescription: Conducting research and developing large-scale transformer-based models on single-cell transcriptomics and rare-disease data.
Optimised model training efficiency using FlashAttention2, sequence packing, and GPU performance tuning, achieving ~50% reduction in computational costs and significantly increasing throughput.
Collaborating closely with interdisciplinary teams, applying machine learning methods to bioinformatics workflows to accelerate therapeutic discoveries.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.subtitle: NeckCare
workDescription: Research and Development for AI applications in current and future projects.
Developed optimal data collection practices, reducing noise in pre-and post-processing of measurements in sensorimotor control measurements.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.subtitle: Nox Medical
workDescription: Worked on validating Nox Medical's machine learning algorithm, designed for detecting sleep apnea events.

experiences.title: Summer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Natera Inc.
workDescription: Worked on the development of a foundational model aimed at understanding cancerous cells and their mutations.
Extracting and preprocessing of DNA bases from the Human Genome database.
